title: Gothicmade: Hana no Utame
synopsis: On a tiny colony world named Carmine, young women known as Songstresses inherit the generation memories  of those who came before them, using their knowledge to help a populace that suffers under the harsh policies of the ruling interplanetary league.
staff: [['Nagano, Mamoru', ['Director', ' Key Animation', ' Screenplay', ' Original Creator', ' Character Design']], ['Wakabayashi, Kazuhiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Ogura, Hiromasa', ['Art Director']], ['Nakura, Yasuhiro', ['Animation Director']]]
